alertDescription.value: the number of not scheduled daemonset

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend daemonset = tostring(Json.daemonset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | extend Desired = Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_daemonset_status_current_number_scheduled' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend daemonset = tostring(Json.daemonset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Current=Val, daemonset, namespace) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, daemonset, namespace | where Desired > Current | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Desired, Current, daemonset, namespace
